name: Tumble Pumpkin
description:
Made for Open Jam 2022.
Can you beat 100,000 points? 300,000? 500,000!?
Take advantage of combos to beat the developer high-score: 583,850!

Source code: GitHub
License: GPL3
Software used: Godot, Krita, GIMP, Audacity, LMMS

Credits:
> Game by FigyTuna
> Art by nicoleperson
> Audio by W. A. Joy

Font: "Crystal Regular" by Felipe Munoz (CC-BY)
